text: "Miss Me Baby" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Chris Cagle. It was released in June 2005 as the first single from his album Anywhere but Here. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Eric Welch and premiered in August 18, 2005. It was filmed entirely on location in the Mojave Desert in California. The whole video is him performing the song with his band, mixed in with a few solo shots of him walking. It debuted at number 19 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of January 19, 2006. ==References== Category:2005 songs
title: Miss Me Baby
